alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Clay; Dickinson; Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 8:28PM CDT until May 12 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Osceola County in northwestern Iowa... Dickinson County in northwestern Iowa... Northeastern Buena Vista County in northwestern Iowa... Clay County in northwestern Iowa... Southeastern Jackson County in southwestern Minnesota... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Round Lake to near Albert City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Webb around 835 PM CDT. Okoboji and Wahpeton around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Spirit Lake, Orleans, Lakefield, Jackson In Jackson County and Kilen Woods State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
